definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Coverage is an important quantitative index for plant community structure.
sentences.chinese: 蓋度或者覆蓋度是植物羣落結構的一個重要數量指標。

sentences.english: The correlation was found between soil moisture and herbage coverage was significant.
sentences.chinese: 土壤溼度與草本植物蓋度呈極顯著正相關。

sentences.english: The results showed that canopy cover and altitude were the most significant environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，冠層蓋度和海拔是最重要的環境因子。
